CustomField.description: If Status = Sold Then True Is Closed Else If Status = Registered Then True Is Closed Else If Status = Commission Then True Is Closed Else If Status = Closed Then True Is Closed
CustomField.formula: (IF( OR( ISPICKVAL( Status__c ,'Sold'), ISPICKVAL( Status__c ,'Registered DLD'), ISPICKVAL( Status__c ,'Commission'), ISPICKVAL( Status__c ,'Closed') ),True,False))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Based On Status Field Display Is Closed Checkbox
CustomField.label: Is Closed
